description._content: Title: [Antonio Lopez de Santa Anna] Creator: Unknown Date: ca. 1853 Part Of: Lawrence T. Jones III Texas photography collection Description: This stereo daguerreotype attributed to Meade Brothers, early photographers in Albany and New York City, New York, is believed to be a studio portrait of Antonio Lopez de Santa Anna (1794-1876). This stereo daguerreotype is in a Mascher-style viewing case. The two images, when viewed through the twin lenses housed in the case, give the impression of three dimensionality. Physical Description: 1 photograph: sixth plate daguerreotype; 7 x 8.3 cm. Form/Genre: Daguerreotypes; Photographs; Portrait photographs File: santaanna1.tif Rights: Please cite Southern Methodist University, Central University Libraries, DeGolyer Library when using this image file. A high-quality version of this file may be obtained for a fee by contacting degolyer@smu.edu. For more information, see: digitalcollections.smu.edu/u?/jtx,491 View Lawrence T. Jones III Texas Photographs at: digitalcollections.smu.edu/all/cul/jtx/
